title: No More Windows: Indian Defense Services Are Switching to Linux
description:
The Defence Ministry of India has decided to replace Windows with an in-house developed Linux distro called Maya on all computers connected to the internet.

The post No More Windows: Indian Defense Services Are Switching to Linux appeared first on Linux Today.

title: NetworkManager 1.44 Brings a New ‘link’ Setting, Bond Options
description:
NetworkManager 1.44 includes a new “link” setting, support for sending a DHCPv6 prefix delegation hint, and new bond options.

The post NetworkManager 1.44 Brings a New ‘link’ Setting, Bond Options appeared first on Linux Today.

title: SandboxAQ Launches Sandwich: Meta-Library of Cryptographic Algorithms
description:
SandboxAQ launched Sandwich, an open-source framework that simplifies modern cryptography management. Learn more here.

The post SandboxAQ Launches Sandwich: Meta-Library of Cryptographic Algorithms appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Introducing KRdp: New RDP Library for Plasma Wayland Session
description:
Explore how KRdp and KDE Plasma integration of cutting-edge technologies brings you a responsive remote control experience on Wayland.

The post Introducing KRdp: New RDP Library for Plasma Wayland Session appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Nephio R1 Aims to Simplify Open-Source Cloud-Native Automation for Telcos
description:
Over a year after the Nephio project was first announced by the Linux Foundation, the open-source cloud-native automation platform is getting its first big release.

The post Nephio R1 Aims to Simplify Open-Source Cloud-Native Automation for Telcos appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Nvidia 535.98 Released With Wayland, Vulkan Fixes
description:
Nvidia 535.98 addresses several bugs, including a bug causing excessive RAM consumption. Learn more here.

The post Nvidia 535.98 Released With Wayland, Vulkan Fixes appeared first on Linux Today.
